original_text: Now she was wearing a long robe with sleeves, for thus were the virgin daughters of the king dressed. So his servant put her out and bolted the door after her.
korean_text: 암논의 하인이 그를 끌어내고 곧 문빗장을 지르니라 다말이 채색옷을 입었으니 출가하지 아니한 공주는 이런 옷으로 단장하는 법이라

sentences.original_text: Now she was wearing a long robe with sleeves
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 소매가 있는 긴 겉옷을 입고 있었는데

sentences.original_text: for thus were the virgin daughters of the king dressed.
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 왕의 처녀 딸들이 그렇게 입었기 때문이었다

sentences.original_text: So his servant put her out
and bolted the door after her.
